name: 4NextTrain-RealtimeIrishRail
0:
”Alexa, ask four next train”
”Alexa, ask four next train to set new favourite”
”favourite Sutton”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: four next train
des:
There's no special process to set this up. Just know the name of your local station, set it as your favourite and go! 

This Skill works for both DART and Train services operating within Ireland.

Image provided by https://visualpharm.com/free-icons/subway-595b40b85ba036ed117dab99 - I have no creative talent, so thank you for providing a great service :)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
